languages.text: "Я бы предложил вам изучить святилище почтенного логиса, но оно было уничтожено бунтовщиками. Мы вывезли несколько уцелевших инфокрипт и подключили их к когитаторам командного пункта. Может, они дадут вам какую-то информацию".

"I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."
languages.original_text: "Я бы предложил вам изучить святилище почтенного логиса, но оно было уничтожено бунтовщиками. Мы вывезли несколько уцелевших инфокрипт и подключили их к когитаторам командного пункта. Может, они дадут вам какую-то информацию".

traits.locale_text: "I would've suggested that you inspect the esteemed logis's sanctum, but it's been destroyed by rebels. We've removed several surviving data-crypts from it and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. Those might give you some information."

"I would've suggested that you inspect the esteemed logis's sanctum, but it's been destroyed by rebels. We've removed several surviving data-crypts from it and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. Those might give you some information."

"I would've suggested that you inspect the esteemed logis's sanctum, but it's been destroyed by the rebels. We have extracted several surviving cybercrypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

"I would've suggested that you inspect the esteemed logis's sanctum, but it's been destroyed by the rebels. We have extracted several surviving cybercrypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

"I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

"I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

languages.text: "Ich hätte vorgeschlagen, dass Ihr das Sanctum des ehrenwerten Logis untersucht, doch die Rebellen haben es zerstört. Wir haben mehrere Daten-Krypten geborgen und sie mit den Cogitatoren der Befehlszentrale verbunden. Sie liefern Euch vielleicht Informationen."
languages.original_text: "I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte vorgeschlagen, dass Ihr das Sanctum des ehrenwerten Logis untersucht, doch die Rebellen haben es zerstört. Wir haben mehrere überlebende Daten-Krypten extrahiert und sie mit den Cogitatoren der Befehlszentrale verbunden. Sie liefern Euch vielleicht Informationen."

languages.text: « Je vous suggérerais bien d'aller inspecter le sanctum du noble logis, mais il a été détruit par les rebelles. Nous en avons extrait plusieurs cryptes de données que nous avons connectées aux cogitateurs du poste de commandement. Elles pourraient vous fournir des informations. »
languages.original_text: "I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous suggérerais bien d'aller inspecter le sanctum du noble logis, mais il a été détruit par les rebelles. Nous en avons extrait plusieurs cryptes de données que nous avons connectées aux cogitateurs du poste de commandement. Elles pourraient vous fournir des informations. »

languages.text: “我本想建议您检查一下尊贵的逻辑士圣所，但那里已经被叛军摧毁了。我们抢出了几个完好的数据密存器，把它们连在了指挥所的沉思者上。或许那些密存器里会有您想要的信息。”
languages.original_text: "I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

traits.locale_text: “我本想建议您检查一下尊贵的逻辑士圣所，但那里已经被叛军摧毁了。我们抢出了几个完好的网络密存器，把它们连在了指挥所的思考器上。或许那些密存器里会有您想要的信息。”

languages.text: 「尊敬する論理学者のサンクトゥムの調査を提案したかったが、反乱者に破壊されてしまった。リカバーできるデータクリプトをいくつか取り出して、司令部の考算機に接続している。何か情報が得られるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬する論理学者のサンクトゥムの調査を提案したかったが、反乱者に破壊されてしまった。残ったサイバークリプトをいくつか取り出して、司令部の考算機に接続している。何か情報が得られるかもしれない」

languages.text: «Le habría sugerido que inspeccionara el sanctum del estimado Logos, pero ha sido destruido por los rebeldes. Hemos recuperado varias criptas de datos y las hemos conectado a los cogitadores del puesto de mando. Podría darle alguna información».
languages.original_text: "I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

traits.locale_text: «Le habría sugerido que inspeccionara el sanctum del estimado logos, pero ha sido destruido por los rebeldes. Hemos extraído varios cibercriptas supervivientes y los hemos conectado a los cogitadores del puesto de mando. Podría darle alguna información».

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer Logis'in kutağını incelemenizi önerirdim fakat isyancılar yok etti. Birkaç veri mahzenini kurtarıp komuta noktamızdaki kavramsayarlara bağladık. Onlardan bilgi edinmeniz mümkün olabilir."
languages.original_text: "I would have suggested that you inspect the esteemed Logis's sanctum, but it was destroyed by the rebels. We recovered several data-crypts and connected them to the cogitators at the command post. They might provide you with some information."

traits.locale_text: "Saygıdeğer Logis'in kutağını incelemenizi önerirdim fakat isyancılar yok etti. Birkaç veri mahzenini kurtarıp komuta noktamızdaki kavramsayarlara bağladık. Onlardan bilgi edinmeniz mümkün olabilir."
